concept.title: WebHelp Responsive Index Terms Page
concept.shortdesc: Helps you to browse through the index terms defined in your documentation.

conbody.draft-comment:
Some hints:
indexterms are collected from DITA...
index terms are hierarchical
conbody.p: To easily find an entry, the list with indexterms are grouped by first letter. The indexes are presented in multiple columns to make it easier to read this page.
More over, an alphabet that contains the first letter of the documentation index terms is generated at the top of the index page. Each letter represents a link to a specific indices section.

section.title: Index Terms Page Components
section.p: The layout components displayed in this page are:

dlentry.dd: An alphabet that contains the first letter of index terms. Each letter represents a link to a specific indices section.
The first letter of the index.
